responses.rationale: Factual description of risk level ('rare') and possibility ('can occur') without explicit framing cues.
Factual reporting of a severe statistic ('deaths of at least 25,000 turkeys') without explicit framing cues.
Factual reporting of the virus type ('deadly H5N8 virus' - treated as technical descriptor here) and event ('turkey deaths') without explicit framing cues.
Factual reporting of potential transmission source ('spreading the virus') and scale ('dozens tested positive') without explicit framing cues.
